author: Steffen Spade
title: Poker Fact
content: Poker was originally played with 20 cards. The 52 card deck came about so that more people could play. The longest ever continuous poker game lasted for eight years, five months, and three days at the Birdcage Theater in Tombstone, Arizona in 1881.
